information.title: Account information
information.description: Below are your addresses based on the account you're logged into.
information.tooltip: The addresses below are the same but in different formats. We provide this information for you to quickly refer to your address in instances like depositing assets into your account.

receive.title: Receive

format.label: Display Format
format.hex: 0x format is only supported on EVM chains.

receive.copied: Your account address has been copied to the clipboard.

close.title: Cancel Request?
close.text: You started a request process. Do you really want to exit from the process?

request.label: Requesting:

moda.description: Create instant, easy-to-share payment request links for any asset on Evmos.

request.title: Request

input.placeholder: Write a message for the recipient of this request

request.subtitle: Asset and amount to request
request.copied: Payment link has been copied to the clipboard.

successful.description: Your payment has been processed on the blockchain.

close.title: Cancel Transfer?
close.text: You started a transfer process. Do you really want to exit from the process?

modal.title: Transfer Assets
modal.description: Deposit and send assets to any account on any chain.

error.title: Keplr is required
error.description: Depositing assets can only be done with the Keplr extension.

helper.description: We prefilled the address of the recipient above with
helper.description2: the Evmos address that you are logged in with
helper.description3: . If you are depositing into a different address, you can make the changes accordingly.

placeholder.mywalletenabled: Paste other recipient's account address here

successful.description: Your transaction has been processed on the blockchain.

processing.title: Hang in there
processing.description: Writing tx into a block, this might take a few minutes.
processing.description2: Meanwhile, you can track the transaction as below.

longer.title: Taking longer
longer.description: It might take longer to retrieve the transaction,
longer.description2: you could track it on the explorer or check your balance.

by-wallet.title: Unfortunately, with Metamask we currently only support sending from Evmos Network.
by-wallet.subtitle: Please use Keplr or choose Evmos.

network.title: I see you're trying to send tokens from
network.title2: network, for that we will need to access your account address.
network.subtitle: Please, approve the network .

assets.text: For axl based assets, please use Satellite instead

connect.wallet: Please make sure your account is connected.

generating.transaction: Error generating transaction. Please try again later.

reserved.amount: Gas fee reserved in the max amount
